p: Again, we conducted an online survey with the help of SoSci Survey (Leiner, 2020). The time required to answer all questions ranged from 9.8 to 68.1 min, with 25.1 min being the median. The findings were considered significant in two-sided testing when p < 0.05. All analyses were conducted using R (R Core Team, 2020) using the same packages from Study 1.
